reviewtext: This is not the world's best walking stick, nor is it a tripod, nor is it a blunt weapon.  However, ours lives in the car, and has served all three purposes quite well.  If we're heading on a hike, and feel we might need to either have a little extra traction, or take some zoom or low light photos, or keep some "Oh he's just growling" off-leash dog away from our ankles, this is a great solution.  If it were sturdier, it would be heavier.  The only reason for 4 stars is I think it could be a little cheaper - but then again I have no QC issues, so maybe it's worth it.
